issue.title: [Docs][R] Add map_batches example from vignette to Cookbook
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15276](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15276). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In ARROW-14029 we are adding an example of using `map_batches()` to sample data and compute aggregate statistics without having the load the whole dataset into memory. We should add these to the cookbook as well.
